last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: Flashbacks reveal dark secrets of Ben's death. Megan seizes a chance for revenge. Rebecca's happily ever after suffers a heartbreaking blow.

name: The One
overview: Love — and lies — spiral when a DNA researcher helps discover a way to find the perfect partner, and creates a bold new matchmaking service.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: As business booms at her DNA-based matchmaking service, co-creator and CEO Rebecca Webb seems unstoppable — until a body is found in the Thames.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Facing a murder investigation, Rebecca and James reunite to get their stories straight. Hannah plays a dangerous game with Megan and Mark.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Mark's birthday party for Hannah brings good — and very bad — surprises. Kate digs into Sophia's past. Rebecca plays hardball with James.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Suspicious, Kate goads Rebecca at Ben's memorial service and pays an embarrassing price. Hannah tells Mark the truth about Megan.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Fabio becomes a liability for Rebecca, leading to a risky bargain and a bittersweet reunion with Matheus. Hannah faces the consequences of her deceit.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Rebecca schemes to stay CEO — and out of jail — while a new threat rises. Sebastian makes a confession to Kate, while Mark wrestles with his own desires.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Nudged by Kate, Matheus begins to doubt Rebecca. Mark makes a choice, and a betrayal. Sophia tells the truth about her mother's crash.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Flashbacks reveal dark secrets of Ben's death. Megan seizes a chance for revenge. Rebecca's happily ever after suffers a heartbreaking blow.
